item.description:
We will be exploring past lives at this meetup with everyone being able to participate in a regression.

Cindy Clark of Peaceful Hearts, who is a hypnotherapist, will be guiding us gently back into one of our other lives and bringing us back again. We have done this topic several times and it is always fun to see where we go!

Bring a dish that can serve at least 4 people and be ready for good food, good conversation and a great time!

We hope to see you there! It is important to RSVP this time as this is usually a very well attended meetup and there others besides meetup members who participate!

dance in the light!

Susan
item.name: Who Were You in the Past?
